title: Chaco Culture National Historical Park: Be A Junior Ranger
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Kids & Youth     Be A Junior Ranger              Be A Junior Ranger        Prairie Bergman gets her Junior Ranger badge.    Â       Junior Ranger Program  Kids -- Want to be a Junior Ranger? Pick up a Junior Ranger booklet at the information desk in the Visitor Center. Learn about the park while completing fun activites as you visit the sites. Return your completed booklet to a Ranger at the information desk to recieve your very own badge. This program is free!
